data.actual_result: The keyboard covers half the screen and there is no message bar.
data.expected_result: You should be sent back to chat with normal viewing.
data.short_description: keyboard stays up after viewing someone’s connected account in discord browser
data.steps_to_repro: - click on the message bar - view someone’s profile (has to be someone who sent a recent message), don't click out of keyboard - view one of their connected accounts in discord’s browser (steam, reddit) - exit out of that and go back to chat
